(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

using the following format:
- [x] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]

### PR summary [dfeac70287](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/16619/commits/dfeac702875510255d0b34fbf8e9efa15d9ddc62)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.RingTheory.Valuation.Archimedean` (new file)|1094|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ bijective_algebraMap_of_subsingleton_units_mrange`
`+ instance (priority := 90) OrderHomClass.toOrderHomClassOrderDual [LE Î±] [LE Î²]`
`+ instance (priority := 90) OrderIsoClass.toOrderIsoClassOrderDual [LE Î±] [LE Î²]`
`+ instance (v : Valuation R Î“â‚€) : CommMonoidWithZero (MonoidHom.mrange v)`
`+ instance : LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero (MonoidHom.mrange v)`
`+ instance {Î“â‚€} [LinearOrderedCommGroupWithZero Î“â‚€] [DivisionRing K] (v : Valuation K Î“â‚€) :`
`+ isPrincipalIdealRing_iff_not_denselyOrdered`
`+ val_mrange_zero`
`+ wellFounded_gt_on_v_iff_discrete_mrange`
`+ wfDvdMonoid_iff_wellFounded_gt_on_v`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

@jcommelin What do you think of factoring out this proof along the lines of
```
- PIR iff Noetherian because local ring is bezout
- Noetherian iff ACCP (also because bezout)
- principal ideals in this valuation-ring-of-integers are balls smaller than valuation of the generator
- if mul-archimedean and densely ordered, then infinite balls, so not ACCP; is not mul-archimedean, then exists x y st forall n, x ^n < y, so that's another infinite chain. so only mul-archimedean-discrete is ACCP
```
That sounds like a good path forward!
